https://tmrev.io/movie/226666-Bandook 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A6xDcJgeD4Ri3QNuwFRpOWgBgqO.jpg Depicts the rise of Bhola Kevat a low cast boatman in the interiors of Uttar Pradesh rising to the unexpected heights of political power. Bandook connects crime and politics, a psychological peep inside the minds of people who use power of gun as a ladder to wordly success, It shows the vast distance covered by human mind from picking a gun to pulling the trigger. Bandook
